title: Lighttaker
description:
Dire straits are upon the lands of dimmur vior. The dark wizard Galdramadur is leeching his strength from darkness. He has summoned his servants to take the light from the people and turn the world into darkness. In a final act of evilness he caused an eternal eclipse.

You are the last of the orden of the lios varnarmur, the defenders of the light. And you are the last warriors standing between the dark wizard and everlasting darkness. These dark times light crystals are the only source of light. Defend the last remaining crystals against the hordes of incoming demons.
